pages.text: Throwing a piece of $(l:resources/edelwood#dark_matter)Dark Matter$() and $(l:resources/corrupti_dust)Corrupti Dust$() on the ground will create a Black Hole, which will vacuum nearby experience orbs and items. Items will be voided, but experience orbs will be collected and output in the form of $(l:resources/experience#xpetrified_orb)Xpetrified Orbs$().
